body:
Post your ideas below on how to make the server more fun or better overall! please don't be mean towards other peoples ideas, everyone is entitled to their own opinion. I would just like to say that it would be better if they made the server hub less laggy but still make it look good. I would like a less laggy hub because not long ago I used to have a pretty bad computer and every time i went on Avicus I would lag like hell xD. People with not so good computer will feel more comfortable joining the server and knowing they wont lag a lot :). But thats just what i think, tell me your ideas! I would love to know.
(Btw not saying the hub right now sucks, the hub looks AMAZING)

title: Ideas on how to make the server better

replies.body:
Things that could be potentially improved on are:
- Precise reporting system, that includes date & time, and an ability to insert a YouTube URL through the /report command.
- Assists in the part-taking of killing an enemy player (specifically the game-mode; Nebula)
- Additional maps or improving the current ones (could include fixing a glitch on a map etc.)
- Additional donator rank that is a bit cheaper than $25, reason being because for some people on the server, that is a hefty amount to spend on a video game even though it is the lowest price for a rank.

Not exactly sure if some of these can/ or will be achieved by I am just throwing some ideas out in the open.

Still, a good idea.
